public class EditThresholdsActivity extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
Activity for editing threshold values in a smart irrigation system. This activity allows users to set and modify various environmental parameter thresholds through a user interface and communicates these changes via MQTT protocol.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • EditThresholdsActivity

      public EditThresholdsActivity()

  • Method Details

    • createMQTTClient

      private void createMQTTClient()
      Creates an MQTT client instance with specified configuration. Initializes an asynchronous MQTT v3 client with connection parameters for HiveMQ broker.

    • connectToBroker

      private void connectToBroker()
      Establishes connection to the MQTT broker. Upon successful connection, enables the save button and publishes a ping message. Connection status is logged for debugging purposes.

    • publishPing

      private void publishPing()
      Publishes a ping message to verify MQTT connection. Sends a JSON formatted ping message to the thresholds topic and subscribes to ping responses.

    • subscribeToTopic

      private void subscribeToTopic(String topic)
      Subscribes to a specified MQTT topic. Sets up message handling callback for receiving messages on the subscribed topic.
      Parameters:
      topic - The MQTT topic to subscribe to

    • processMessage

      private void processMessage(String message)
      Processes incoming MQTT messages containing threshold values. Parses JSON message and updates UI input fields with received values.
      Parameters:
      message - JSON formatted string containing threshold values

    • onCreate

      protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Initializes the activity and sets up UI components. Creates MQTT client, establishes broker connection, and sets up button click listeners.
      Overrides:
      onCreate in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
      Parameters:
      savedInstanceState - Bundle containing the activity's previously saved state

    • saveValues

      private void saveValues()
      Validates and saves the threshold values. Collects input values, performs validation, and publishes updated thresholds via MQTT. Displays appropriate error messages for invalid inputs.

    • isValidNumber

      private boolean isValidNumber(String value)
      Validates if a string represents a valid number without leading zeros.
      Parameters:
      value - The string to validate
      Returns:
      boolean indicating if the string is a valid number

    • initializeViews

      private void initializeViews()
      Initializes all UI view components. Binds layout elements to their respective view variables.

    • showLoadingDialog

      private void showLoadingDialog()
      Displays a loading dialog while fetching initial values. Shows an indeterminate progress dialog that cannot be canceled by the user.

    • dismissLoadingDialog

      private void dismissLoadingDialog()
      Dismisses the loading dialog if it is currently showing.
